Navigation.Description: StreamStats supporting NHDplus V2 network navigation resources

/.Name: Available Navigation Resources
/.Description: Returns a list of available navigation resources

/{CodeOrID}s.Name: Navigation Resource
/{CodeOrID}s.Description: Returns navigation resource with corisponding configuration options.

/{CodeOrID}/Route.Name: Navigation Resource Feature Route
/{CodeOrID}/Route.Description: Returns navigation resource features from specified options.
